change.changenote: Section 9.1 was enacted by BC Reg 48/2022, effective February 28, 2022.
Section 12.1 was enacted by BC Reg 205/2021, effective July 12, 2021.
Schedule 1, section 3.1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Time and place of general meeting
bcl:section.bcl:text: A general meeting must be held at the time and place the Board determines.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.4 (b) (iii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: one of the other directors present at the meeting, if both the president and vice-president are unable to preside as the chair.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: If there is no individual entitled under these Bylaws who is able to preside as the chair of a general meeting within 15 minutes from the time set for holding the meeting, the voting members who are present must elect an individual present at the meeting to preside as the chair.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.6 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Business, other than the election of the chair of the meeting and the adjournment or termination of the meeting, must not be transacted at a general meeting unless a quorum of voting members is present.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.8 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Lack of quorum at commencement of meeting
bcl:section.bcl:text: If, within 30 minutes from the time set for holding a general meeting, a quorum of voting members is not present,

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in the case of a meeting convened on the requisition of members, the meeting is terminated, and

in any other case, the meeting stands adjourned to the same day in the next week, at the same time and place, and if, at the continuation of the adjourned meeting, a quorum is not present within 30 minutes from the time set for holding the continuation of the adjourned meeting, the voting members who are present constitute a quorum for that meeting.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.9 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: If quorum ceases to be present
bcl:section.bcl:text: If, at any time during a general meeting, there ceases to be a quorum of voting members present, business then in progress must be suspended until there is a quorum present or until the meeting is adjourned or terminated.

change.changenote: Schedule 1, section 3.10 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 114/2022, effective July 4, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The chair of a general meeting may, or, if so directed by the voting members at the meeting, must, adjourn the meeting from time to time and from place to place, but no business may be transacted at the continuation of the adjourned meeting other than business left unfinished at the adjourned meeting.
